Package freenet.clients.http.filter

Interface Summary
CharsetExtractor For a specific text/-based MIME type, extracts the charset if possible.
ContentDataFilter Data filter for a specific MIME type.
FilterCallback Callback to be provided to a content filter.
FoundURICallback  
 

Class Summary
BMPFilter This class would verify whether the BMP header is valid or not Reference: http://www.fastgraph.com/help/bmp_header_format.html http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BMP_file_format
CharsetExtractor.BOMDetection  
ContentFilter Freenet content filter.
ContentFilter.FilterOutput  
CSSReadFilter  
ElementInfo  
FilterUtils  
GenericReadFilterCallback  
GIFFilter Content filter for GIF's.
HTMLFilter  
JPEGFilter Content filter for JPEG's.
MIMEType A MIME type, for purposes of the filter.
NullFilterCallback  
PNGFilter Content filter for PNG's.
 

Exception Summary
CommentException Thrown when a filter operation cannot complete and the filter has produced some error output to help guide the user in resolving the situation.
DataFilterException Exception thrown when the data cannot be filtered.
KnownUnsafeContentTypeException  
UndetectableCharsetException  
UnknownCharsetException  
UnknownContentTypeException  
UnsafeContentTypeException Thrown by the filter when it cannot guarantee the safety of the data, because it is an unknown type, because it cannot be filtered, or because we do not know how to filter it.
UnsupportedCharsetInFilterException
